title: HAP 80 - Scholarly Contributions - African American Professional Philosophers
itunes:title: HAP 80 - Scholarly Contributions - African American Professional Philosophers
description: From the latter half of the nineteenth century to the 1970s, African Americans only rarely obtain jobs as philosophy professors but bring distinctive perspectives to the profession.

itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
